channel.title: SWS: Swoop Gangs (Sunday mornings in August)
channel.description:
![](upload://aX1bWWyRbpPAxhmroww2Svcxa3j.gif) # Live to Ride, Ride to Live!
*****
Play outlaw Swoop Bikers in a Star Wars universe.
* Your swoop gang is the absolute Best of the Worst. * Commit crimes against the Imperial Remnant in control of your planet * Help charities and the downtrodden * hand out some good old-fashioned duracrete justice. * Work under the Imperial Heat's radar and go toe to toe with your Rival Gang. * Be cool, and when cool won't cut it, be karking awesome!
Inspired by shows like Sons of Anarchy, Sopranos, The Wire, and Mayans MC.
-----------------------------------
This game is part of the ongoing Star Wars Saturdays series (on Sundays!!!). The time setting is *after* the end of Episode VI of the Star Wars movie series (that's *Return of the Jedi* ) when the Empire is falling and the Alliance to Restore the Republic is taking control in fits and starts. If you've seen The Mandalorian TV show, that's a good inspiration for what's happening in the setting.
Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the SWS canon for future miniseries and added to our wiki (https://starwarssaturdays.miraheze.org/wiki/Main_Page).
**CW: Violence, Imperial power abuse, violence. Strong emotional ties.** **System** : 1%er Engine **Duration** : Five 3 hour sessions **Breaks** : 1 mid-point break per session (10 mins) **Venue** : GM’s Zoom **Recording** : Yes, but made public only if consent by all the players **Attendance** : Joining all sessions is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. **Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-card, and open-door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
[date=2021-08-01 time=09:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-08-01 time=12:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MdqbJRMTrXxHzDakMVP) [date=2021-08-08 time=09:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-08-08 time=12:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2](https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MdqbKak8D9pw8av1mbS) [date=2021-08-15 time=09:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-08-15 time=12:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 3](https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MdqbMeXQWhvnZY9M70X) [date=2021-08-22 time=09:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-08-22 time=12:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4](https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MdqbOFyUuQR5n12QEys) [date=2021-08-29 time=09:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-08-29 time=12:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 5](https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MdqbPwlU-6fB7HwZibs)

item.title: SWS: Swoop Gangs (Sunday mornings in August)
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

Live to Ride, Ride to Live!

Play outlaw Swoop Bikers in a Star Wars universe.

  • Your swoop gang is the absolute Best of the Worst.
  • Commit crimes against the Imperial Remnant in control of your planet
  • Help charities and the downtrodden
  • hand out some good old-fashioned duracrete justice.
  • Work under the Imperial Heat’s radar and go toe to toe with your Rival Gang.
  • Be cool, and when cool won’t cut it, be karking awesome!

Inspired by shows like Sons of Anarchy, Sopranos, The Wire, and Mayans MC.

This game is part of the ongoing Star Wars Saturdays series (on Sundays!!!). The time setting is after the end of Episode VI of the Star Wars movie series (that’s Return of the Jedi ) when the Empire is falling and the Alliance to Restore the Republic is taking control in fits and starts. If you’ve seen The Mandalorian TV show, that’s a good inspiration for what’s happening in the setting.

Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the SWS canon for future miniseries and added to our wiki (https://starwarssaturdays.miraheze.org/wiki/Main_Page).

CW: Violence, Imperial power abuse, violence. Strong emotional ties.
System : 1%er Engine
Duration : Five 3 hour sessions
Breaks : 1 mid-point break per session (10 mins)
Venue : GM’s Zoom
Recording : Yes, but made public only if consent by all the players
Attendance : Joining all sessions is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
Safety : Lines & Veils, X-card, and open-door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.
